channel.title: almost-surely on Trang Bui
channel.description: Recent content in almost-surely on Trang Bui

item.description: Trang Bui I am a third-year PhD student in Statistics at University of Waterloo. My research interest lies in Statistical Learning, Statistical Modelling, and Network Statistics. I am working with Professor Stefan Steiner and Professor Nathaniel Stevens in the area of Design and Analysis of Experiments on Networks. I am currently working as a Teaching Assistant and also a consultant at Statistical Consulting and Collaborative Research Unit at University of Waterloo.
